required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 10, 2017
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Observational Usage Study of Faslodex in Patients Suffering From Initial Breast Cancer in France
clinical_study.official_title: Observational Usage Study of Faslodex in Patients Suffering From Initial Breast Cancer in France

brief_summary.textblock: the purpose of this study is to describe the way Faslodex is used in France, in patients suffering from initial breast cancer, that is to evaluate Faslodex treatment duration and to determine patients profile

primary_outcome.measure: Evaluate Faslodex therapeutic strategy and treatment duration
primary_outcome.time_frame: At the end of the study

primary_outcome.measure: Describe the characteristics of patients treated with Faslodex
primary_outcome.time_frame: At the end of the study

arm_group.description: Patients suffering from initial breast cancer, treated with Faslodex, treatment which was stopped during 2007

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients suffering from initial breast cancer, treated with Faslodex, treatment which was stopped during 2007

overall_official.affiliation: TNS Healthcare - France138, avenue Marx Dormoy92120 Montrouge
